iss.description: It MUST be equal to the claim iss of the PAR Request previously sent to the Authorization Server

state.description: It MUST be equal to the claim state of the PAR Request previously sent to the Authorization Server

code.description: Authorization code generated by the Authorization Server at at the end of the user authentication

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the JWT was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

nbf.description: The UNIX Timestamp before which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processinge

exp.description: The UNIX Timestamp after which the JWT expires
